label: Mark normalized acquisitions
name: mark-normalized
description: Marks normalized acquisitions by adding rec-<something> to acquisition label. A dicom file with the 'NORM' entry in the ImageType array is assumed to be normalized.
author: Noah Mercer

rec_value.description: The value to use with the _rec entity. Defaults to 'norm', meaning that 'rec-norm' will be added to the acquisition label.
